item.description:
As far as i'm concerned, this is the Providence's premier cultural event.

Downtown Providence turns into one huge block party as Empire Street is shut off to accommodate a concert stage that rocks from 1 pm to 1am, with an audience of over 5,000. Musicians that span the spectrum play for 12 straight hours on 2 stages.

Besides the music, find Providence mainstays like familiar food trucks and plenty of beer.

So come on down and enjoy the music. All for just 7 bucks !!!

Please list what time you plan on attending so that the group can find you.

Since this is an all day event, there's no single plan of action. Come and go whenever.

Feel free to use the comments section to coordinate and/or discuss the event.

See you there.

Â 

More info here:

http://as220.org/foo-fest-saturday-august-11th-2012/

http://as220.org/foo-fest/foo-fest-2012/

http://www.facebook.com/Foo.Fest
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us, we'll be around
item.name: AS220 FooFest (outdoor/indoor all day music concert)
